parserToCreate: [CASE samplingImpracticalRemarks IN ('Private Property - Denied Permission', 'Private Property - No contact with landowner', 'Terrain Unsafe (could not safely approach to within 25 m of point)', 'Can\'t cross River', 'No GPS reception, cannot find point') => 'logistical'; CASE samplingImpracticalRemarks IN ('Snow pack impassible') => 'location snow covered'; CASE samplingImpracticalRemarks IN ('Running water near point - unable to Hear','Weather (rain or wind)','Ran out of Time (five hours past sunrise or noticeably decreased bird activity)','Other') => 'other'][IF(IS_BLANK(samplingImpracticalRemarks)), 'OK'][LOV]
